General.Name: Aroot Co. Ltd
General.Description: Aroot Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells printers in South Korea. The company offers POS, mobile, label, and RFID printers, as well as related accessories. Its products are used for various applications, such as retail, hospitality, transportation and logistics, healthcare, and manufacturing, as well as in public sector and field services. It is also involved in the sale of terminals. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Osan-si, South Korea.
